```json
{
  "summary": "The test suite verifies the functionality of the nesting module, ensuring that the nesting object can be correctly instantiated, that it raises an error when a child grid exceeds the bounds of its parent grid, that generated files have consistent hashes, that plotting works as expected, that the configuration can be round‑tripped through YAML, and that the object can be saved without data loss.",
  "business_intent": "To ensure the reliability and correctness of the nesting component used in hierarchical grid systems, preventing runtime errors, maintaining data integrity, and supporting visualization and persistence in scientific or GIS applications.",
  "keywords": [
    "nesting",
    "unit testing",
    "grid hierarchy",
    "initialization",
    "boundary validation",
    "file hash",
    "plotting",
    "YAML serialization",
    "data persistence",
    "software quality"
  ]
}
```
